summary: The decompiled version accurately captures the nested loop logic and state mutation of the original contract. The core functionality is preserved with only minor differences in style and metadata.
differences: License changed from UNLICENSED to MIT
Contract name changed from NestedLoop to DecompiledContract
Function visibility remains public but marked as payable in decompiled version (adds unnecessary capability)
Variable increments expressed as 'number + 0x01' instead of 'number += 1' (functionally equivalent)
Added decompilation metadata comments and documentation
